english: season; quarter (of a year); time of year; harvest season

etymology.description: 會意/会意: 禾 + 子
etymology.interpretation: Combines a grain stalk and a child, evoking the time when crops ripen and are gathered. This seasonal sense broadened to mean a season in general and, in compounds like 季度, a quarter of the year.

examples.chinese: 我们这个季度要发布新产品(我們這個季度要發布新產品)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒmen zhège jìdù yào fābù xīn chǎnpǐn.
examples.english: We will launch a new product this quarter.

examples.chinese: 这个季节常下雨(這個季節常下雨)。
examples.english: It often rains in this season.

examples.chinese: 春季花开最美(春季花開最美)。
examples.english: Flowers bloom most beautifully in spring.
